socials.name: gack

socials.name: kiss

socials.victFound: $n kisses you.
socials.charAuto: All the lonely people :(

socials.othersAuto: $n is really crazy now!  $e cackles at $mself.

socials.name: laugh
socials.victFound: $n laughs at you mercilessly.  Hmmmmph.
socials.charAuto: You laugh at yourself.  I would, too.
socials.othersAuto: $n laughs at $mself.  Let's all join in!!!

socials.name: giggle

socials.charAuto: You giggle at yourself, which makes you giggle at yourself, which makes you ...

socials.charAuto: You are shaken by yourself.
socials.othersAuto: $n shakes and quivers like a bowl full of jelly.

socials.charAuto: You growl at yourself.  Boy, do you feel bitter!
socials.othersAuto: $n growls at $mself.  This could get interesting...

socials.name: scream
socials.charFound: ARRRRRRRRRRGH!!!!!  Yes, it MUST have been $S fault!!!
socials.othersFound: $n screams loudly at $N.  Better leave before $n blames you, too!!!
socials.victFound: $n screams at you!  That's not nice!  *sniff*
socials.charAuto: You scream at yourself.  Yes, that's ONE way of relieving tension!
socials.othersAuto: $n screams loudly at $mself!  Is there a full moon up?

socials.name: comfort

socials.name: worry
socials.charNoArg: You worry about what's going to happen.
socials.othersNoArg: A troubled look suddenly crosses $n's face.  Wonder what's wrong?
socials.othersFound: $n looks at $N with a troubled gaze.
socials.victFound: $n looks at you worriedly.
socials.charAuto: You worry about what's going to happen.
socials.othersAuto: A troubled look suddenly crosses $n's face.  Wonder what's wrong?

socials.name: drool
socials.charNoArg: You drool down the front of your shirt.
socials.othersNoArg: $n drools all over $mself -- making a TERRIBLE mess!
socials.victFound: $n looks at you lustily and drools.
socials.charAuto: You drool down the front of your shirt.
socials.othersAuto: $n drools all over $mself -- making a TERRIBLE mess!

socials.name: nod
socials.victFound: $n nods at you in agreement.
socials.charAuto: You attempt to nod at yourself and get dizzy instead.
socials.othersAuto: $n nods quietly to $mself.  What a wacko.

socials.name: purr
socials.charFound: You rub up against $N and purr contentedly.
socials.victFound: $n rubs up against you and purrs contentedly.
socials.charAuto: You purr quietly to yourself.

socials.name: point
socials.victFound: $n points at you.  How rude!
socials.charAuto: You point at yourself, obviously very confused.

socials.name: rub
socials.charNoArg: You rub your hands together in greedy anticipation.
socials.othersNoArg: $n rubs $s hands together in greedy anticipation.
socials.charFound: You give $N a nice, long, kinky rubdown.
socials.victFound: $n gives you a rubdown, running $s hands over your tense shoulders...Mmmm...
socials.charAuto: You rub yourself...lingering a little too long in some places.

socials.name: bleed
socials.charNoArg: You bleed profusely -- making a horrible mess!
socials.othersNoArg: $n weakly bleeds all over the floor.
socials.othersFound: $n bleeds on $N.  Watch out, YOU might be next!
socials.victFound: $n bleeds on you -- ewww!  Get away!!
socials.charAuto: You bleed all over yourself.

socials.name: highfive
socials.charNoArg: You jump in the air and give a BIG high five to...umm...absolutely nothing.
socials.othersNoArg: $n wildly high fives the air, looking very foolish -- very foolish indeed.
socials.charFound: You jump in the air and give a BIG high five to $N!
socials.victFound: $n gives you a BIG high five!  Way to go!!
socials.charAuto: You try to give yourself a high five.  What ARE you thinking?
socials.othersAuto: $n tries to high five $mself, but ends up looking foolish instead.

socials.name: propose
socials.charNoArg: You propose to everyone in the room.
socials.othersNoArg: $n proposes to everyone in the room.  Very odd.
socials.charFound: You kneel and romantically propose to $N.
socials.othersFound: $n gets on one knee and proposes to $N.
socials.victFound: $n gets down on one knee and romantically proposes to you.
socials.charAuto: You are SO full of yourself!

socials.name: peer
socials.victFound: $n peers at you intently.
socials.charAuto: You get a little cross-eyed with your attempts to stare yourself down.
socials.othersAuto: $n peers at $mself, crossing $s eyes in the process.

socials.name: worship
socials.charNoArg: You prostrate yourself and worship the gods!
socials.charFound: You fall on your knees and worship $N.
socials.victFound: $n falls to the ground and worships you.
socials.charAuto: You worship yourself.

socials.name: bearhug
socials.charNoArg: Whom do you wish to bearhug?
socials.charFound: You overwhelm $N with a great, big, hulking bearhug.
socials.victFound: $n clutches you tightly in an overwhelming bearhug!
socials.charAuto: You vainly clutch yourself in a bearhug for consolation.
socials.othersAuto: $n hugs $mself as tightly as possible.  Looks like $e could use a hand.

socials.name: innocent
socials.charFound: You look at $N and bat your eyelashes -- the picture of innocence!
socials.victFound: $n looks at you and innocently bats $s eyelashes.

socials.name: collapse
socials.charNoArg: You collapse on the floor from exhaustion.
socials.othersNoArg: $n dramatically collapses to the floor from exhaustion.
socials.victFound: Suddenly, $n collapses into your arms from exhaustion.

socials.name: stretch
socials.charNoArg: You lean back and streeeeeettch your arms and legs.
socials.othersNoArg: $n stretches luxuriously.  Kinda makes you want to doesn't it?

socials.name: spam
socials.charNoArg: You mutter, 'spam' quietly to yourself again and again.
socials.othersNoArg: $n rests in a corner and mutters 'spam' quietly to $mself.
socials.victFound: You've been SPAMMED by $n!

socials.name: boast
socials.charNoArg: You boast loudly of all your amazing accomplishments.
socials.othersNoArg: $n boasts loudly in a pigheaded fashion.
socials.charFound: You boast to $N of all your great deeds.
socials.victFound: Once again, $n boasts to you, what a bloated ego!
socials.charAuto: You boast to yourself of all your great feats!  Your own biggest fan.

socials.name: squirm
socials.charNoArg: You squirm uncontrollably in your consternation.
socials.othersNoArg: $n squirms uncontrollably, suddenly looking very uncomfortable.
socials.charFound: You look at $N and squirm with delight.
socials.othersFound: $n looks at $N and squirms with delight.
socials.victFound: $n looks at you and squirms with delight.

socials.name: moo
socials.charNoArg: You chew your cud and moo plaintively.  Muh-OOOOO!
socials.othersNoArg: $n turns cowlike eyes on you, chews $s cud, and moos plaintively.
socials.charFound: You focus all your bovine Zen on $N, and speak your thoughts.  Muh-OOOOO!
socials.othersFound: Slowly, $n looks at $N, chews $s cud, and muh-OOOOs!
socials.victFound: $n moos at you.  What could that possibly mean?
socials.charAuto: You settle down into the center of your bovine Zen; the foolish world thinks you're just mooing.
socials.othersAuto: $n is mooing at $mself again...  You look for an exit...

socials.name: moon
socials.charNoArg: You drop your drawers and moon everyone in the room!
socials.othersNoArg: $n drops $s pants and gives you the vertical smile!
socials.victFound: $n bends over and gives you the vertical smile!
socials.charAuto: You try to moon yourself, but you can't see your A** that well.
socials.othersAuto: $n nearly goes into convulsions while trying to moon $mself.

socials.name: goose
socials.charNoArg: Who would you like to goose?
socials.charFound: You tenderly goose $N on the tush.
socials.othersFound: $n reaches around $N's backside and gooses $M tenderly.
socials.victFound: $n gooses you tenderly!
socials.charAuto: You pinch yourself on the rear, you must be desperate.

socials.name: wince
socials.charFound: You look at $N and wince at $S remark.
socials.victFound: $n winces at your remark.

socials.name: type
socials.charNoArg: You can't type for crap tonight!  You give up in frustration!
socials.othersNoArg: $n throws $s hands up in disgust at $s lousy typing skills!

socials.name: mutter
socials.othersFound: $n looks at $N and mutters something nasty under $s breath.
socials.victFound: $n looks at you and mutters something nasty under $s breath.

socials.name: rofl
socials.charNoArg: You roll on the floor, laughing hysterically.
socials.othersNoArg: $n falls to the ground and rolls around laughing hysterically.
socials.charFound: You fall to the floor laughing at $N's remark.
socials.othersFound: $n rolls on the floor laughing at $N's antics!
socials.victFound: $n rolls on the floor laughing at your antics!

socials.name: sob
socials.charFound: You sob quietly to yourself because $N has hurt your feelings so badly.
socials.othersFound: $n sobs quietly to $mself because $N was a jerk!
socials.victFound: You feel like a cad because you've made $n sob.

socials.name: pant
socials.victFound: $n looks at you and pants lustily...

socials.name: whine
socials.charNoArg: You whine to anyone who will listen to you.
socials.othersNoArg: $n whines pathetically to anyone who will listen.
socials.charFound: You whine to $M, hoping desperately that at least $E will give a damn.
socials.victFound: $n whines pathetically to you.  What a loser!
socials.charAuto: You whine to yourself, probably the only one who will listen.
socials.othersAuto: $n whines to $mself.  At least $e isn't bitching to YOU.

socials.name: flex
socials.charFound: You show off to $N, flexing your muscles proudly.
socials.othersFound: $n flexes $s muscles, in a vain attempt to impress $N.
socials.victFound: $n flexes $s muscles in a vain attempt to show off to you.

socials.name: embrace
